name: A Long Day At Work
description:
Story:

Stanley is stuck at the office alone, finishing up some work, when suddenly he realizes his printer is printing in reverse.  He tries to escape the office, struggling through time looped rooms along the way in this 4d puzzle platformer. 

Controls:
  • Pause- Tab or escape
  • Walk- wasd 
  •  Jump- space 
  •  Interact- e
Made for Ludum Dare 47
